title: Mango, cardamom and ginger smoothie with yogurt

ingredients.item: 250g frozen mango150g Yeo Valley Organic Natural Yogurt
½ tsp fresh root ginger, grated
2-3 mint leaves, shredded, plus extra to serve

instructions.step: Grind the cardamom seeds to a fine powder using a pestle and mortar or the back of a teaspoon. Put the mango, yogurt, lime juice, ginger, cardamom powder and shredded mint in a blender and whizz until smooth. Loosen with about 100-200ml water if you prefer a thinner mixture. Pour into 2 glasses and top with the extra mint.
